author: Ofer A
title: A beautiful country retreat in Rome
text: Just 20 minutes by bus from the heart of Rome, a beautiful, relaxed, country haven of peace and quiet on the old Appian Way. The best of both worlds combined in the Appia Antica Resort. Maurizio and the staff go out of their way to make you feel at home and provide anything you need (thanks so much Paola for all your help!). They are passionate about the Appian Way and Rome and share that passion to help make your visit and stay at the AAR memorable. If you prefer to enjoy Rome without being in the busy center - this is the place for you.
